app.title: FindIt
app.footer: FindIt – local, private catalog stored in your browser.
catalog.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, description, or tags…
catalog.empty: No items yet. Add your first item to start organizing.
catalog.confirmDelete: Delete this item? This cannot be undone.
item.heading: Item details
item.titleHelp: Use a short, descriptive name so you can quickly find this item.
item.descriptionPlaceholder: Where is it, what does it look like, or any details that help you find it again.
item.tagsHelp: Separate tags with commas. You can filter by tags on the main screen.
item.imageHelp: Optional. Images are stored locally. Large images may increase storage usage.
item.confirmDelete: Delete this item permanently? This cannot be undone.
settings.heading: Settings
settings.languageHelp: Interface language and layout direction (LTR/RTL) will change immediately.
settings.themeHelp: Neumorphic design adapts to the selected theme while preserving contrast.
settings.offlineHelp: FindIt automatically caches core files for offline use. Use your browser’s storage settings to clear data.
settings.clearDataHelp: This will erase your entire catalog from this device. You cannot undo this action.
settings.confirmClear: Clear all catalog data from this device? This cannot be undone.
settings.cleared: All local catalog data has been cleared.
about.heading: About FindIt
about.intro: FindIt is a private, offline‑first catalog app that lives entirely in your browser.
about.privacyBody: Your data never leaves your device. All items are stored locally using IndexedDB, and no account is required.
about.featureImages: Image attachments with zoomable viewer and gestures.
about.featureImportExport: JSON and CSV import/export for backup and migration.
about.featureAccessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA‑oriented design and keyboard support.
about.creditsBody: Built as a lightweight example of a modern Progressive Web App with bilingual support (English/Hebrew).
